content: ***this pattern is available for free on my linked blog *** --- ***about this design*** this afghan square is the 3rd design part of the traveling crochet afghan blanket by lion brand this square is inspired by my home country the netherlands and features the tulip stitch it s a simple 3 row repeat and only uses basic stitches you can purchase an inexpensive pdf to support my work read below --- ***about this pattern*** crochet your own tulips from holland square using this crochet pattern in pdf format this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the finished dimensions are 10 x 10 / 25 5 x 25 5 cm after blocking the printable pdf has a total of 3 pages including - a graph - a photo tutorial available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/traveling-crochet-afghan-square-3/ ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg
